Verses: 1 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Paarvonidaththil Poi: Enakku Aaraadhanai Seyya En Janangalai Anuppividu.
2 nee Avargalai Anuppividamaatten Enbaayaagil, Un Ellai Adangalaiyum Thavalaigalaal Vaadhippen.

3 nadhi Thavalaigalaith Thiralaaip Pirappikkum; Avaigal Un Veettilum Un Padukkai Araiyilum, Un Manjaththinmelum, Un Oozhiyakkaarar Veedugalilum, Un Janangalidaththilum, Un Aduppugalilum, Maappisaigira Un Thottigalilum Vandhu Erum.
4 andhath Thavalaigal Unmelum, Un Janangal Melum, Un Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaar Melum Vandhu Erumendru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.

5 melum Karththar Moseyinidaththil Nee Aaronai Nokki: Nee Un Kaiyilirukkira Kolai Nadhigal Melum Vaaikkaalgal Melum Kulangal Melum Neetti, Egipthu Dhesaththin Mel Thavalaigalai Varumbadi Sey Endru Sol Endraar.
6 appadiye Aaron Than Kaiyai Egipthilulla Thanneergal Mel Neettinaan; Appozhudhu Thavalaigal Vandhu, Egipthu Dhesaththai Moodikkondadhu.
7 mandhiravaadhigalum Thangal Mandhiravithdhaiyinaal Appadich Seydhu, Egipthu Dhesaththinmel Thavalaigalai Varappanninaargal.

8 paarvon Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Azhaippiththu: Andhath Thavalaigal Ennaiyum En Janangalaiyum Vittu Neengumbadi Karththarai Nokki Vendikkollungal; Karththarukkup Baliyidumbadi Janangalaip Pogaviduven Endraan.

9 appozhudhu Mose Paarvonai Nokki: Thavalaigal Nadhiyilemaaththiram Irukkaththakkadhaai Avaigalai Ummidaththilum Ummudaiya Veettilum Illaamal Ozhindhupogumbadiseyya, Umakkaagavum Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkaagavum Ummudaiya Janangalukkaagavum Naan Vinnappam Pannavendiya Kaalaththaik Kurikkum Menmai Umakke Iruppadhaaga Endraan.
10 adharku Avan: Naalaikku Endraan. Appozhudhu Ivan: Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Oppaanavar Illai Enbadhai Neer Ariyumbadikku Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinbadi Aagakkadavadhu.
11 thavalaigal Ummaiyum Ummudaiya Veettaiyum Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaiyum Ummudaiya Janangalaiyum Vittu Neengi, Nadhiyilemaaththiram Irukkum Endraan.
12 moseyum Aaronum Paarvonai Vittup Purappattaargal. Paarvonukku Virodhamaaga Varappannina Thavalaigal Nimiththam Mose Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaan.
13 karththar Moseyin Solpadi Seydhaar; Veedugalilum Mutrangalilum Vayalgalilum Irundha Thavalaigal Seththuppoyitru.
14 avaigalaik Kuviyal Kuviyalaagach Serththaargal; Adhinaal Boomiyengum Naatrameduththadhu.
15 ilaguvundaayitrendru Paarvon Kandapodho, Than Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththi, Avargalukkuch Sevikodaamal Ponaan; Karththar Solliyirundhabadi Aayitru.
16 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyinidaththil: Nee Aaronai Nokki: Un Kolai Neetti, Boomiyin Puzhudhiyin Mel Adi; Appozhudhu Adhu Egipthu Dhesamengum Penkalaaip Pom Endru Sol Endraar.

17 appadiye Seydhaargal; Aaron Than Kaiyilirundha Than Kolai Neetti, Boomiyin Puzhudhiyinmel Adiththaan; Appozhudhu Adhu Manidhar Melum Miruga Jeevangal Melum Penkalaai Egipthu Dhesamengum Boomiyin Puzhudhiyellaam Penkalaayitru.

18 mandhiravaadhigalum Thangal Mandhiravithdhaiyinaal Penkalaip Pirappikkumbadip Pirayaththananj Seydhaargal; Seydhum, Avargalaal Koodaamalpoyitru; Pengal Manidhar Melum Miruga Jeevangal Melum Irundhadhu.
19 appozhudhu Mandhiravaadhigal Paarvonai Nokki: Idhu Dhevanutaiya Viral Endraargal. Aanaalum, Karththar Solliyirundhabadi Paarvonudaiya Irudhayam Kadinappattadhu; Avargalukkuch Sevikodaamal Ponaan.
20 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Naalai Adhigaalame Nee Ezhundhupoi, Paarvon Nadhikkup Purappattu Varumpodhu, Avanukku Munbaaga Nindru: Enakku Aaraadhanai Seyyumbadi En Janangalaip Pogavidu.

21 en Janangalaip Pogavidaayaagil, Naan Un Melum, Un Oozhiyakkaarar Melum, Un Janangalmelum, Un Veedugal Melum Palavidha Vandugalai Anuppuven; Egipthiyar Veedugalum Avargal Irukkira Dhesamum Andha Vandugalaal Niraiyum.
22 boomiyin Naduvil Naane Karththar Enbadhai Nee Ariyumbadi En Janangal Irukkira Kosen Naattil Annaalile Vandugal Varaadhabadikku, Andha Naattai Viseshappaduththi,
23 en Janangalukkum Un Janangalukkum Viththiyaasam Undaagumbadi Seyven; Indha Adaiyaalam Naalaikku Undaagum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
24 appadiye Karththar Seydhaar; Magaathiralaana Vandu Jaadhigal Paarvon Veettilum, Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Veedugalilum, Egipthu Dhesam Muzhuvadhilum Vandhadhu; Vandugalinaale Dhesam Kettuppoyitru.
25 appozhudhu Paarvon Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Azhaippiththu: Neengal Poi, Ungal Dhevanukku Dhesaththiledhaane Baliyidungal Endraan.

26 adharku Mose: Appdtich Seyyaththagaadhu; Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Naangal Egipthiyarudaiya Aruvaruppai Baliyidugiradhaai Irukkume, Egipthiyarudaiya Aruvaruppai Naangal Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Baliyittaal, Engalaik Kallerivaargal Allavaa?
27 naangal Vanaandharaththil Moondru Naal Pirayaanam Poi, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalukku Vidhikkirabadiye Avarukkup Baliyiduvom Endraan.

28 appozhudhu Paarvon: Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Vanaandharaththil Baliyidumbadikku, Naan Ungalaip Pogaviduven; Aanaalum, Neengal Adhiga Dhooramaaip Pogavendaam; Enakaaga Vendudhal Seyyungal Endraan.

29 adharku Mose: Naan Ummai Vittup Purappattapin, Naalaikku Vandugal Paarvonaiyum Avar Oozhiyakkaararaiyum Avar Janangalaiyum Vittu Neengumbadi, Naan Karththarai Nokki Vendudhal Seyven; Aanaalum, Karththarukkup Baliyidugiradharku Janangalaip Pogavidaadhabadip Paarvon Ini Vanjanai Seyyaadhiruppaaraaga Endraan.
30 mose Paarvonai Vittup Purappattuppoi, Karththarai Nokki Vendudhal Seydhaan.
31 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyin Solpadi, Vandu Jaadhigal Paarvonaiyum Avan Oozhiyakkaararaiyum Avan Janangalaiyum Vittu Neengumbadi Seydhaar; Ondraagilum Meendhirukkavillai.
32 paarvono, Indha Muraiyum Than Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththi, Janangalaip Pogavidaadhirundhaan.
